trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SEQ_00<tab>This Adarkim warrior has his eyes on a particular kind of flower.
TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_TODO_00<tab>Slay three purbols and obtain pungent flowers.
TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the pungent flowers to the Adarkim warrior.
TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SHOPPER02758_000_000<tab>Could I ask for your help? I have no one else to turn to.
TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SHOPPER02758_000_001<tab>I have searched all over the Azim Steppe for one single flower. Someone told me that it was sold in Reunion, but I have had no luck here either.
TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SHOPPER02758_000_002<tab>Could you search for this flower for me? It shall not be a dangerous task by any means.
TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SHOPPER02758_000_003<tab>No. I should not lie, least of all to a visitor to our land. It will be a job fraught with peril.

TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SHOPPER02758_000_004<tab>For the only way to obtain the flower I require is by slaying a purbol. If you are willing to help, you should be able to find some north of here. Please, slay three of them and bring back their flowers.
TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SHOPPER02758_000_005<tab>Please, slay three purbols and bring back their flowers.
TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SHOPPER02758_000_010<tab>Were you able to get three of the flowers?
TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SHOPPER02758_000_011<tab>Oh my, that stench. Quite ghastly indeed. I suppose I should tell you just why I needed these flowers.
TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SHOPPER02758_000_012<tab>I belong to the Adarkim, the largest of the Xaela tribes. Recent events have led to me being considered as a future khan.

TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SHOPPER02758_000_013<tab>The position brings with it much power and pleasures, but by the same token, it has given rise to bitter and bloody rivalries. My older brother was a candidate before me, but after no less than eight attempts on his life, he vanished with nary a trace.
TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SHOPPER02758_000_014<tab>In his absence, I have risen in the line of succession, meaning <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> am now the marked man. <sigh> I did not ask for this...

TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SHOPPER02758_100_015<tab>Alas, wishing that it were not so will not stay the daggers in the dark. That is why I sought out these foul-smelling flowers─to ward off would-be assassins. And thanks to your help, I may enjoy a moment's respite.

TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SHOPPER02758_000_015<tab>In the meantime, I will set about finding a permanent solution to my problem. That is, finding my brother, Adkiragh. Unless I do so, there will be no peace for me...save in death.
